resources.string: Seems like you have not added any data to your list yet
An empty list can not be sorted
Now you can find your custom index of array by clicking on FIND button

string.name: string_main_found_msg_error_greater
string.font: Your entered index is greater than the array size. Choose a less one and click on FIND button

string.name: string_main_found_msg_error_less
string.font: Your entered index is less than the first array index. Choose a greater one and click on FIND button
